original_text: “Son of man, your brothers, even your brothers, your kinsmen, the whole house of Israel, all of them, are those of whom the inhabitants of Jerusalem have said, ‘Go far from the Lord; to us this land is given for a possession.’
korean_text: 인자야 예루살렘 주민이 네 형제 곧 네 형제와 친척과 온 이스라엘 족속을 향하여 이르기를 너희는 여호와에게서 멀리 떠나라 이 땅은 우리에게 주어 기업이 되게 하신 것이라 하셨나니

sentences.original_text: your brothers, even your brothers, your kinsmen,
the whole house of Israel, all of them,
are those of whom the inhabitants of Jerusalem have said,
to us this land is given for a possession.'
